law.catch_line: Licensed horse racetrack may be issued Nonquota type 1 license.
law.text: In order to promote economic development and tourism, other provisions of the Kentucky Revised Statutes notwithstanding, the department may issue an NQ1 retail drink license under KRS 243.030 to a horse racetrack that is licensed under KRS 230.300 and is located in a wet or moist city under KRS 242.1238. The license issued under this section shall be in effect only for horse racetrack premises where live racing meets were held in 2006. Nothing in this section shall be construed as authorizing the issuance of any alcoholic beverage license on any part of the horse race track's premises that is located outside the city's limits.
law.history: Repealed, reenacted, and renumbered 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 121, sec. 101, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 59, sec. 2, effective June 26, 2007.
